detail_desc: Wide trousers in soft cashmere with an elasticated waist and straight, wide legs.
Short, 5-pocket skirt in washed denim with a button fly, short slit at the front and cut-off, raw-edge hem.

Short, wide dress in airy fabric with a small, frilled collar. Deep opening at the back with narrow ties at the back of the neck and back. Long balloon sleeves with a puff at the shoulders and narrow, covered elastication and a frill trim at the cuffs. Gathered seams at the waist and hips. Jersey lining. The polyester content of the dress is partly recycled.
Tulle skirt with a glittery elastic waistband. Lined.

Short-sleeved shirt in cotton poplin with a button-down collar, open chest pocket, yoke with a pleat at the back and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Sleeveless top in airy, crinkled chiffon with a small, frilled collar that is gathered at the front. Opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck. Lined.
Joggers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, low crotch, side pockets and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Long earrings in metal and plastic with fabric tassels. Length 16 cm.
Short, hooded jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with a drawstring at the top, wide raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Set with leggings and socks in soft, fine-knit cotton. Leggings in a textured knit with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Straight-cut, off-the-shoulder dress in woven fabric with a wide elasticated flounce at the top.
Boxer shorts in organic cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.

KATE MORGAN x H&M. Playsuit in an airy, patterned viscose weave with dropped shoulders and short, flounced sleeves. Press-studs at the back, diagonal side pockets and an elasticated seam and sewn-on tie belt at the waist.
Joggers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a ribbed, elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets and tapered legs with ribbed hems.

Pull-on trousers in soft cotton twill with covered elastication and a decorative bow at the waist. Diagonal side pockets and gently tapered legs with shaping seams at the knees and covered elastication at the hems. One patterned pair.
Knee-length lace dress with a V-neck and short cap sleeves. Seam at the waist, flared skirt and a concealed zip at the back.
Short-sleeved shirt woven in a cotton blend with a turn-down collar, French front and rounded hem. Slim Fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Straight-cut jacket in cotton denim with a collar and buttons down the front. Flap chest pockets with a button, front pockets and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Unlined.
Calf-length dress in a crinkled weave with a V-neck, wrapover front with ties at the waist and short sleeves with a slit and ties. Unlined.
Scarf woven in a soft cashmere blend containing some wool with fringes on the short sides. Size 35x175 cm.
Cold shoulder blouse in a patterned crêpe weave with a V-neck, tie-top shoulder straps and short, wide sleeves. Frill trim and a small opening with ties at the top, and inset lace trims at the front.
Short-sleeved, wrapover bodysuits in soft, organic cotton jersey with press-studs down one side and at the crotch.
Fitted polo-neck top in soft modal jersey with long sleeves.

Padded bomber jacket with appliqués, a detachable, lined hood in sweatshirt fabric, flap front pockets with a press-stud, a zipped pocket on one sleeve and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Quilted lining.
Short, straight dress in a printed viscose crêpe weave with a round neck, opening with a button at the back of the neck and short sleeves.
Calf-length skirt in soft, gently draping satin. High waist with concealed elastication and a flare to the hem. Unlined.
Sleeveless dress in glittery, patterned tulle with a round neckline, opening with a button at the back of the neck and a seam with a wide flounce at the hem. Lined.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Top in a cotton blend with a jersey-lined, drawstring hood and kangaroo pocket. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Triangle bikini top with removable inserts, adjustable multiway spaghetti straps and a wide elastic trim at the hem. No fasteners.
Shorts in stretch, denim-look jersey made from a cotton blend with an elasticated waist, fake front pockets, real back pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Short, straight-cut dress in heavily draping, beaded and sequined chiffon with a square neckline and spaghetti shoulder straps. Lined. The beads are made of plastic.
Knee-length shorts in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, a back pocket and raw-edge hems.
Scarf in soft, fine knit with a brushed finish. Fringes on the short sides. Size 65x180 cm.
Brazilian briefs in microfibre with a low, V-shaped waist, lined gusset and high cut at the back.
5-pocket ankle-length trousers in stretch cotton corduroy with a high waist, zip fly and button, and straight legs with raw-edge hems.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, superstretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and button, and super-skinny legs. The jeans are made partly from recycled cotton.
Soft faux shearling jacket with a stand-up collar, zip down the front with a chin guard, and zipped chest pocket. Rounded and longer at the back. Fleece lining.
Padded gilet with a detachable hood, stand-up collar, zip down the front with a chin guard, and side pockets. Slightly longer and rounded at the back.

Knitted jacket with a soft thermal fleece lining, stand-up collar and small appliqué at the top. Zip down the front, side pockets and a contrasting colour jersey trim around the pockets, cuffs and hem.
Velour-covered hair elastic.
Trousers in a linen and cotton blend in a relaxed fit with and elasticated drawstring waist and zip fly. Side pockets, a welt back pocket, a slightly lower crotch and tapered legs.
Elasticated scrunchie in woven fabric with a scarf detail.

Slightly longer jacket in woven fabric with a lined, drawstring hood, zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front and a concealed drawstring at the waist. Flap chest and front pockets with concealed press-studs, an inner pocket with a hook and loop fastening, and an adjustable tab with a press-stud at the cuffs. Lined.

This practical sewing kit contains everything you need to mend your favourite items. Your clothes will thank you! The kit contains 4 needles, 10 pins, 5 safety pins, one pair of scissors, a tape measure, a seam ripper, 5 metres black thread, 5 metres white thread, 4 white plastic buttons and 4 black plastic buttons.
Jumper in a chunky-knit alpaca blend with low dropped shoulders. Slightly longer at the back.
Cropped, fitted sports top in fast-drying functional fabric. The top is designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.
Thong briefs in lace with a low waist and lined gusset.
Top in soft jersey with a round neckline, long sleeves, and gathers in the sides for best fit over the tummy.
Boxer shorts in organic cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Short shorts in an airy viscose weave with patch front pockets, a high, elasticated waist with a small frill trim and sewn-on ties, and wide legs.
Shorts in organic cotton jersey with elastication and a decorative drawstring at the waist, and side pockets.

High-waisted, ankle-length sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric. Wide panel to hold in and shape the waist containing a concealed key pocket. Sculpting seams at the back that showcase the body’s physique.

Sleeveless dress in soft, slub cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps that cross at the back. Second layer at the top with a wide lace trim, an elasticated seam at the waist and a scalloped lace trim at the hem.
Narrow belt in grained imitation leather with a metal buckle. Width 1.2 cm.
Popover jacket in woven fabric with a drawstring hood and zip at the top. Large front pocket with a concealed zip, and elastication at the cuffs. Mesh lining.
Cap in woven fabric with a motif on the front and an adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
Fitted, calf-length dress in soft rib-knit viscose with a V-neck and long sleeves.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with an elasticated waist and reflective details. Brushed thermal inside.
Vest top in soft, marled jersey with a chest pocket and raw, roll edges around the neckline and armholes.
Shorter top in textured jersey with a V-neck with elasticated gathers at the front, long sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs and a frill trim at the hem.
Knee-socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Short, fitted dress in stretch twill made from a cotton and Tencel™ lyocell blend. V-neck at the front, an adjustable halter neck with press-studs at the back, and press-studs down the front. Unlined.
Imitation suede sandals with a strap with a decorative bow at the front and an adjustable, elasticated ankle strap with a metal buckle. Imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Covered heels 8 cm.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric made from an organic cotton and recycled polyester blend with a soft brushed inside. Covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, side pockets and ribbed hems.

Small shoulder bag in grained imitation leather. Flap with a concealed magnetic fastener and decorative buckle and a narrow, adjustable shoulder strap with a metal fastener. One large compartment and a card compartment. Imitation leather lining. Depth 5 cm, height 9 cm, width 17 cm.
Short, fitted top in ribbed jersey with a stand-up collar, zip down the front and long sleeves.

Jacket in soft, washed denim made partly from recycled cotton with a collar and buttons down the front. Flap chest pockets with a button, diagonal front pockets, buttoned cuffs and tabs with buttons at the back of the hem.
Gently fitted dress in velour with long sleeves and a seam at the waist with a flared skirt. Unlined.

Short jacket in soft cotton twill with a drawstring hood, concealed press-studs down the front and flap front pockets with press-studs. Covered elastication at the cuffs and a drawstring at the hem. Unlined.
3/4-length leggings in soft, organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Skinny-fit treggings in superstretch twill with an elasticated waist, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Calf-length dress in stretch, patterned jersey with a round neck and short butterfly sleeves.
Jumper in a fine knit containing some wool with a round neck, opening with a bow at the back of the neck, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Short-sleeved shirt in a patterned cotton weave with a turn-down collar, French front, yoke at the back and rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Lined swimsuit with a matching hairband. Swimsuit with a flounced trim around the neckline and flounce-trimmed shoulder straps. Hairband with a knot at the front and covered elastication at the back.
Top in viscose jersey with a V-neck front and back and spaghetti shoulder straps. Jersey lining.
Pre-tied bow tie in a satin weave with an adjustable strap and fastening at the back. Width 11 cm.
